channel.title: 718 Server: Disable MySql
channel.description:
It's causing major lag on my server. I don't even use MySql. Does anyone know how I can disable it? I believe it's trying to connect to something that isn't there & causing lag.
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2h66ag5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ebdg5u.png[/img]
